WRITING.TITLE: Is there a way to favourite subreddits?
WRITING.TEXT: I just switched from baconreader, and while this app is much better, it is lacking in some features IMO. I am subscribed to a lot of subs, and it takes forever to scroll all the way down the list. Is there a way to pin subs to the top of the list on Android (kinda like how Baconreader can)?. Or alternatively, is there a way to add a slider to the list of subreddit?

Yes, with the exception of some performance enhancing drugs. Working out breaks down your muscle which is then rebuilt by the excess calories/energy you intake. Without working out, you have no muscle that needs rebuilt, so your body will store that excess energy as fat. Genetics determines where that fat will be stored.
